p: The organizational reaction was a key consideration for nurses across studies in this review. Participants looked to their respective organizations to provide them with knowledge about the pandemic that was easy to understand and delivered in a consistent way. They did not want ‘mixed messages’. Understanding the best practice in PPE use and being supplied with adequate PPE appear to be the largest issues of concern and can be seen in many studies related to pandemics and epidemics ( Cohen and Casken, 2011, Huang et al., 2020, Jones et al., 2017, Michaelis et al., 2009, Speroni et al., 2015)
